title: 6-Month Impact Assessment
description: Evaluate your career progression and the long-term impact of the AI training program after 6 months.

questions.question: Are you still employed in the same role you started after the program?
options: Yes, but I've moved to a different company
Yes, but I've moved to a different role
No, I left that job but I'm employed elsewhere
N/A - I was already employed when I started

questions.question: Describe your current role and what you do with AI or technology.
questions.placeholder: Share details about your role, responsibilities, and how you use AI...

questions.question: What is your current company?
questions.placeholder: Company name or type (e.g., Tech startup, Healthcare company)

questions.question: Have you worked at any other companies since the program? If so, which ones?
questions.placeholder: List previous companies or leave blank

questions.question: Have you received any promotions, raises, or increased responsibilities since starting? (Select all that apply)
options: Yes, increased responsibilities but no raise yet

questions.question: If you received a raise, what percentage increase was it (approximately)?
How are you using your AI certification or capstone projects in your current role?
questions.placeholder: Describe how your certification and projects have helped in your work...

questions.question: Has the certification helped you advance in any way?
options: Not yet, but I expect it will

questions.question: Would you be willing to share your success story with future students? This could be a short written testimonial or even a recorded video.
options: Yes, I'd like to share my story

questions.question: Can you tell us: What was your situation before the program, what made you decide to enroll, and what's happened since you finished?
questions.placeholder: Share your journey - where you started, why you enrolled, and your outcomes since completing the program. This may be used as a testimonial for future students (with your permission).

questions.question: Looking back at 6 months, what was the most valuable part of the program?
If you selected 'Other', please specify what was most valuable:
What could we have done differently?
questions.placeholder: Share your suggestions for how the program could be improved...

questions.question: Would you still recommend this program?
Are you interested in staying involved with the program?
options: Yes, I'd like to be a mentor or speaker
Yes, I'd like to attend alumni events
Maybe, just keep me updated on programs

questions.question: If you're interested in being a mentor or speaker, what email should we use to reach out?
